title: Courgette stuffed with savoury tofu spread
ingredients: ['2 courgettes, halved lengthwise', '3 teaspoons olive oil', '1 (75g) tub ready made savoury tofu spread', '2 teaspoons dried basil', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', 'chives (optional)', '1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice']
